base.name: Base
base.description: The Base æpp allows you to create and manage the accounts used to sign into all æpps. It serves as digital home base where each user is able to manage the balances associated with each of their accounts and can easily transfer tokens between accounts.
base.shortDescription: Create and manage the accounts used to sign into all æpps.

proof.name: Proof
proof.description: The Proof æpp allows you to prove that something (image, PDF, audio file etc.) existed at a certain point in time. By storing hashes on the chain, users can verify details like time and date, creating accessible and consolidated proof of liability.
proof.shortDescription: Prove something existed at a certain point in time.

chaerity.name: Chærity
chaerity.description: The Chærity æpp allows you to ask and support questions for a good cause. If the celebrity being asked the question answers via video on their Twitter account by the deadline, all community support for the question is donated to charity.
chaerity.shortDescription: Ask and support questions for a good cause.

theWall.name: The Wall
theWall.description: The Wall æpp allows you to post a piece of content and for other users to contribute AE tokens to the user’s account. This rewards high quality content creation as messages are then organized by highest supporter and cannot be deleted.
theWall.shortDescription: Post a piece of content and receive contributions.

voting.name: Voting
voting.description: The Voting æpp, running directly on the Ethereum Main Net, allows you to propose something and then put it to a yes or no vote within the community. This lets shareholders express meaningful opinions that can potentially change the system itself.
voting.shortDescription: Propose something and put it to a community vote.

transfer.name: Transfer
transfer.description: The Transfer æpp handles all financial transactions in a decentralized way allowing you to easily transfer funds between addresses.

address.name: Addresses
address.description: Addresses allows you to access and customize your contacts while using other aepps to facilitate connection within the ecosystem.

blockchainExplorer.name: Blockchain Explorer
blockchainExplorer.description: With Explorer you can search the æternity testnet by block, transaction or address, allowing you to verify interactions in real time.
blockchainExplorer.shortDescription: Search æternity by block, transaction or address.

messages.name: Messages
messages.description: Messages offers you secure messaging and is seamlessly integrated to ensure clearer communication between users.
messages.shortDescription: Write messages in a state channel.

oaeuth.name: OÆuth
oaeuth.description: The OÆuth æpp allows you to use a decentralized blockchain identity to log into your favorite websites. This puts users in charge of their own privacy by allowing them to grant access to their general account information in a secure way without the need to actually type in their passwords.
oaeuth.shortDescription: Log into your favorite sites in a secure way.

haello.name: Hællo
haello.description: The Hællo æpp allows you to build trust amongst strangers by turning them into activity partners through the utilization of secure smart contract payments. The æpp allows users who are interested in meeting new people to offer to pay for their outing and to create unique shared experiences.

vaecation.name: Væcation
vaecation.description: The Vacation æpp allows you to easily and securely plan and pay for group activities and travel. It takes the headache out of large group planning by allowing users to utilize the power of smart contracts to facilitate smooth financial transactions between fellow travelers.
vaecation.shortDescription: Plan group holidays using smart contracts.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: Submit for and curate community whitelists.
whitelist.shortDescription: Submit for and curate community whitelists.
